${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Smart building connectivity that frees space, costs and energy A new local area network solution promises to bring a significant increase in performance – and significant cost savings – to your buildings and properties. How? By bringing in-building connectivity up to light speed.
Passive Optical LAN is the LAN of the future, and it outperforms a traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN everywhere you look.
- Faster, easier and cheaper to install.
- Lower operating and energy costs.
- More robust and easier to maintain.
- Better network performance.
On our new website, you will find all the benefits that Passive Optical LAN brings to your properties and your customers. You can estimate the potential cost savings for each of your smart buildings with our LAN Savings Calculator. And don’t forget to view our case studies to learn how Passive Optical LAN could give your properties that extra edge.
Wherever you are in your development plans, Nokia Passive Optical LAN can improve them. Visit our website to learn more. U.S. and Canada:+1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)
